scripts.check-env: node -e "const fs=require('fs');const path=require('path');const envFiles=['.env','.env.local'];const found=envFiles.filter(f=>fs.existsSync(path.join(process.cwd(),f)));if(found.length>0){console.error('❌ Environment files found in git:',found.join(', '));console.error('Please remove these files before committing.');process.exit(1);}else{console.log('✅ No environment files found in git');}"
